VulnerabilityDesc.Name: fake_dep_1
VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Fake deposit means that a token contract’s standard interfaces can be invoked but it does not transfer tokens
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: As long as all paths in the transfer or transferFrom function are executed normally, the transfer amount, transfer object and transfer personnel must be the same as those indicated by the function parameters.
